meanings.sent1: She guilted her friend into helping with the project.
meanings.sent2: He guilted his sister into sharing her toys.
meanings.sent3: The puppy guilted its owner into giving extra treats.
meanings.sent4: The sad eyes of the stray dog guilted the passerby into stopping.
meanings.sent5: The teacher guilted the students into studying harder for the test.

meanings.definition: To manipulate someone into feeling guilty.
meanings.sent1: The salesman guilted the customer into buying more than needed.
meanings.sent2: She guilted her parents into letting her stay out later.
meanings.sent3: The cat guilted its owner into opening the window for fresh air.
meanings.sent4: The politician guilted the audience into supporting his cause.
meanings.sent5: The child guilted his siblings into sharing their snacks.
